Title: Relates to barring a person convicted of a hate crime from attending any state public school of higher education
Summary: Bars a person who is convicted of a hate crime from attending any SUNY or CUNY institution; provides for the expulsion of a student who is convicted of hate crimes; provides for reinstatement of such student if the conviction is subsequently overturned.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to barring a person convicted of a hate crime from attending any state public school of higher education
